pageContext.claim: “And they held Pennsylvania [in 2016], even though it was, you know, we only had -- It was 98% of the vote was in. If I lost every vote in the two percent, I still would've won, by a lot. They, they held it. ”
pageContext.analysis: Trump won Pennsylvania in 2016 with a margin of less than one percent. It was one of the most narrow presidential races in history.
